metadata.title: Data Report of the Research Cruise to Collect Data on Oceanography of the Western Bering Sea, July 1989
metadata.description: Data include CTD, oxygen and chlorophyll a measurements carried out in the western Bering Sea in July 1989
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Research cruise to collect data on oceanography of the western Bering Sea

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: Irregular

Access constraints: None
